ygData.subject: RE: [The EverQuest Tavern] Everquest and Star Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I have done Camelot, Shadowbane, and now Starwars.............. No one still can beat this game, EQ is the best Luis Binnier  wrote: I
ygData.messageBody:
I have done Camelot, Shadowbane, and now Starwars..............


No one still can beat this game, EQ is the best

Luis Binnier <shannara200@...> wrote:
I know what you mean, as a player of both I find that
there's many things about Star Wars does not have,
here is just a few. You can own property, business
house and live stoke. A player can train in anything,
there is no class structure and not levels anybody can
group with anybody what you do is develop abilities.
Last but not least the grafices are the best it looks
so real you loss track of time. I myself my give up
everquest for a while but I won't cancle my account, I
will play more in the future.

Luis

--- "Gibson, Sara M" wrote:
> It is interesting how many EQ-ers I have seen that
> have moved over to the online Star Wars game. I
> myself have not, but I know that at least half of my
> guild took some time from EQ to go play Star Wars,
> and have not returned yet∩┐╜∩┐╜
>
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Luis Binnier [mailto:shannara200@...]
> Sent: Friday, August 08, 2003 11:05 AM
> To: theeverquesttavern@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [The EverQuest Tavern] Everquest and Star
> Wars
>
>
>
> Hello All, I have been playing Everquest for about 2
> 1/2 years and I got the star wars one about a month
> ago, I want to know if anyone else is playing star
> wars also? I find the Star wars to be excellent
> theirs
> more to it then everquest, but I still love
> everquest
> and I play it also. I find I split my time between
> the
> two of them, I want to know if any of you are doing
> the star wars game on line and what you think of it
>
> Peace to all
>
> Luis
